item.title: Accreditation & Affiliationss
item.description: PEAC Accredited since 2016, granting government subsidies to a number of students through the Educational Service Contracting (ESC) program A partner of the Global Initiative for Exchange and Development (GIED), a non-governmental organization dedicated to empowering individuals and fostering connectivity through volunteerism and community-building for sustainable development. A partner and supporter of UCCP-Bradford Feed My Lambs Ministry that envisions its beneficiaries to be free from all forms of poverty in life.

item.title: History
item.description: Church leaders of the United Church of Christ in the Philippines (UCCP), Bradford Church, organized and established the Matilda L. Bradford Christian School, Inc. (MLBCSI) on February 11,1996. The MLBCSI was founded to continue, enhance and actualize the Christian Education Nurture – Children’s Ministry (CEN) of the church. The objectives of the CEN include “the creation of a teaching and learning environment that nurtures faith, builds communities and enhances the response of people to God’s call to mission; and the strengthening of the faith journey of the members of the congregation that they may realize, experience and live a life acceptable to God”.

item.title: MLBCSI
item.description: The Matilda L. Bradford Christian School, Inc. envisions to be a leading Christian institution. It commits to provide quality Christian Education that best serves its people and community.
